name: Unfit Knight
description:
A game made for the Boss Rush Jam 2023. Made on GB Studio. 

This game takes place in the 90s. You play as a 90s kid and play a board game called Nerdy Kingdoms. In the board game You play as a Knight who is well not cut out to be a Knight. And this knight can't find his sword in his messy room. So he brings a bag of random stuff to fight bosses. And yes there will be more bosses and story later on. Good Luck!

Controls:  Z/A: Jump

X/B: Use Weapons hold down to run faster 

 Arrows/WSAD: Move
